_sText:
My second map on FPSbanana,
This is the Condemned Tower in "Castlevania DOS"
The map is created for CounterStrike Source, and it's pretty big ^^
And it's not a buyzone in the map,
becourse you find weapons you need in the tower ^^



!!!WARNING!!!
1. JUMP FROM THE EDGE (Where you are standing)
AT THE BIG ROOM TO THE OTHER SIDE,
YOU MUST MAKE A GOOD SPRINT TO MAKE IT!
BUT YOU GET USED TO IT ^^
2. USE FLASH! (In some areas)
!!!WARNING!!!



Castlevania DOS Trailer:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rTW02bftWD8
